note:
A 32 years-old French guy somewhere lost in the clouds, I do not tend to be too verbose on Social medias, but who knows I may want to chat.
I am developer by day, mainly using Go but having a deep interest in Rust (my tech-lead does not agree). My job consist in making Games Stream: my main interests are Cloud Orchestration, Observability, Data Processing with Graph and/or Queueing Theory.

I have a PhD in imposteur syndrome and maybe soon a real one.

I am mainly fleeing away from the centralised social media platforms, and I believe in the Fediverse, I am planning to self-host my own server soon...ish and look really toward Calckey.
